entry.title: Adding New BIP Editors
entry.summary: The discussion begins with an acknowledgment of a lack of awareness regarding a specific issue related to BIPs editors, highlighting that the topic has not arisen in conversations with one individual. It is noted that personal communications have been held with all five individuals who have confirmed their willingness to serve as BIPs editors, underscoring a collective agreement and commitment among the designated persons. Furthermore, Jonatack and Murch are mentioned as having responded to the thread about this matter, indicating active participation and engagement from the community. Links to their responses are provided for reference, offering direct access to their input on the subject. The inclusion of these links, [Jonatack's response](https://gnusha.org/pi/bitcoindev/83b69000-ca1e-4a58-90b5-114cb09ac0bb@googlegroups.com) and [Murch's response](https://gnusha.org/pi/bitcoindev/53a0015c-b76a-441a-920b-32bd88d5e778@murch.one), facilitates further exploration of their viewpoints and contributions to the discussion, enriching the dialogue around BIPs editorship.
